mapper.sql: FROM REPORT_TB rt INNER JOIN CHALLENGE_AUTH_TB cat ON rt.challenge_auth_no = cat.auth_no INNER JOIN USER_TB ut ON ut.user_no = rt.reported_user_no
mapper.select: /* selectReportDetail */ SELECT rt.report_no reportNo, cat.auth_tp_cd challengeAuthType, cat.auth_url challengeAuthUrl, cat.auth_reg_dt authRegDate, ut.user_id reportedUserId, ut.user_email reportedUserEmail, rt.process_status processStatus, rt.report_content reportContent, ut2.user_id reportingUserId, ut2.user_email reportingUserEmail, rt.report_reg_dt reportRegDate, tt.trans_en challengeName FROM REPORT_TB rt INNER JOIN CHALLENGE_AUTH_TB cat ON rt.challenge_auth_no = cat.auth_no INNER JOIN USER_TB ut ON rt.reported_user_no = ut.user_no INNER JOIN USER_TB ut2 ON rt.reporting_user_no = ut2.user_no INNER JOIN OPERATED_CHALLENGE_TB oct ON oct.CHALLENGE_NO = cat.AUTH_C_NO INNER JOIN BASE_CHALLENGE_TB bct ON oct.challenge_base_no = bct.base_no INNER JOIN TRANSLATION_TB tt ON bct.base_nm_t_no = tt.trans_no WHERE rt.REPORT_NO = #{reportNo}

/* selectReportDetail */ SELECT rt.report_content reportContent, rt.report_reg_dt reportRegDate, ut.user_id reportingUserId, ut.user_email reportingUserEmail FROM REPORT_TB rt INNER JOIN USER_TB ut ON rt.reporting_user_no = ut.user_no WHERE rt.challenge_auth_no = (SELECT challenge_auth_no FROM REPORT_TB WHERE report_no = #{reportNo}) AND report_no != #{reportNo} ORDER BY report_reg_dt DESC
